description: The Chip component is a compact element that represents an input, attribute, or action. It can be used to display information or actions in a confined space.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the chip will be disabled.

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback fired when the delete icon is clicked.

examples.title: Basic Chips
examples.description: Basic chips with different states including closeable and disabled variants.
examples.code:
<Chip label="Basic Chip" />
<Chip label="Closeable Chip" onClose={() => alert('Chip closed!')} />
<Chip label="Disabled Chip" disabled />

examples.title: Sizes
examples.description: Chips are available in two sizes: medium and small.
examples.code:
<Chip label="Medium Chip" size="medium" />
<Chip label="Small Chip" size="small" />
